name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: World of Warcraft Reaper Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embrace the dark power of the Reaper with intense visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace the power of the Reaper from World of Warcraft with this immersive live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A dark and powerful interface inspired by the ominous presence and energy of the Reaper.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that complements the Reaper’s fierce and commanding presence.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into WoW-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as formidable and impactful as the Reaper in battle.
